2025-03-09 17:37:53.6718 [Info] Executed DbCommand (102ms) [Parameters=[@__user_Email_0='?' (Size = 4000)], CommandType='Text', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT CASE
    WHEN EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM [Users] AS [u]
        WHERE [u].[Email] = @__user_Email_0) THEN CAST(1 AS bit)
